contentrichtext.text: '''Gallery Black Swan''', a now-defunct [[surrealism|surrealist]] [[art gallery|gallery]] in [[Chicago, Illinois|Chicago]], was the site of the [[1976 World Surrealist Exhibition]]. It later became the site of [[Michael Jordan's Restaurant]]. '''References''': *[http://www.isomedia.com/homes/harpo/biog.htm James Koehnline - Biography] *[http://www.autonomedia.org/surrealistsubversions/review.html Fifth Estate Review of ''Surrealist Subversions''] *http://forum.psrabel.com/portal/ausstellungen.html (German) *[http://www.legacy-project.org/artists/display.html?ID=113 The Legacy Project: Visual Arts Library entry on Hiroshi Nakamura] *[http://www.chijitsu.com/01.RAREBOOKS/RAREBOOKS/chijitsu3/chijitsu3.2.html] {{coord missing|Illinois}} {{Chicago-stub}} [[Category:Art galleries in Illinois]]
